originalText.text: Dr Paul Haffey has great bedside manner. He pays attention and is conservative in his approach, which is what I am looking for. His team is polite and efficient and follow-through is excellent. I recommend him with no reservations.

text.text: Dr Paul Haffey has great bedside manner. He pays attention and is conservative in his approach, which is what I am looking for. His team is polite and efficient and follow-through is excellent. I recommend him with no reservations.

originalText.text: I was very anxious about the prodedure, but Dr. Haffey melted my anxiety, informed me about every step, and pleasantly surprised me when he announced the procedure was finished (seemed especially swift). An outstanding experience. I'm very grateful.

text.text: I was very anxious about the prodedure, but Dr. Haffey melted my anxiety, informed me about every step, and pleasantly surprised me when he announced the procedure was finished (seemed especially swift). An outstanding experience. I'm very grateful.

originalText.text: Dr. Haffey was thorough and explained my treatment and next steps, gave several referrals and options for treatment.  I do think he could’ve listened more to my own lived experience with my back pain.

text.text: Dr. Haffey was thorough and explained my treatment and next steps, gave several referrals and options for treatment.  I do think he could’ve listened more to my own lived experience with my back pain.

originalText.text: Dr Haffey is the best. He helps me feel at ease and has talked me thru each of the procedures he’s done for me. Highly recommend his calm, friendly, sincere care. Best of all, I have pain relief!

text.text: Dr Haffey is the best. He helps me feel at ease and has talked me thru each of the procedures he’s done for me. Highly recommend his calm, friendly, sincere care. Best of all, I have pain relief!

originalText.text: Dr. Haffey has greatly helped me with my chronic medical problems.  He listens carefully to me and takes a measured conservative approach to treatments and medications.  Dr. Hafffey is highly responsive when I need him and I am very grateful to be under his care!
